heading: Monday
text: Occasional sunshine in the south and through the valleys during the morning, then increasing clouds, becoming mostly cloudy during the afternoon with occasional sun. Highs in the upper teens to near 20 in southern and the Champlain Valley, low to mid teens elsewhere. Lake effect likely in the Tug Hills and Western NY. Highs in the low to mid teens. Westerly winds less than 10 mph gusting to 15.

heading: Monday Night
text: Becoming mostly cloudy. Increasing chance of snow showers over the Northern Greens. Not much colder tonight, temperatures stay in the low to mid teens, single digits in the northeast. Lake Effect snow over the north and western ADK, possibly stretching into west central VT. More snow showers over the northern Greens before midnight tapering off late. Winds become light and variable.

heading: Tuesday
text: A few scattered flurries along the international border early, dissipating before morning, then increasing sunshine becoming mostly sunny. Highs from the mid to lower 20s northeast, and upper 20s to near 30s south. Breezy over Lake Champlain, light and variable elsewhere.
